monitor=network_monitor host=localhost status=UNKNOWN node=fixture reason=missing_dependency checked=0 failures=0 dep=curl
monitor=service_monitor host=localhost status=WARN node=fixture reason=failed_units checked=3 failures=1 failed_units=sshd
monitor=timer_monitor host=runner status=SKIP node=fixture reason=timer_missing unit=linux-maint.timer
monitor=last_run_age_monitor host=runner status=WARN node=fixture reason=stale_run age_min=120 max_age_min=60 path=/var/log/health/full_health_monitor_latest.log
monitor=ntp_drift_monitor host=localhost status=CRIT node=fixture reason=ntp_drift_high checked=1 warn=0 crit=1
monitor=patch_monitor host=localhost status=WARN node=fixture reason=security_updates_pending total=5 security=2 kernel=1 reboot_required=unknown
